comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
@zloyden Issue still persists even on main page at [https://www.kyoceradocumentsolutions.fr](url). 

Not sure why this issue was closed since the website is globally ranked in the first 1,8 million for number of visitors, while commit #https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/394f692b1edbe5a60a6190eea3534192dd76d374 fixed an issue for a website globally ranked under 8 million for it's number of visitors.

issue.title: my.plaid.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://my.plaid.com/sign-in](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmy.plaid.com%2Fsign-in) ### Comment Username: @raxod502 > When logging into the Plaid consumer portal, if metrics.plaid.com is blocked, then login may fail with an "Error" popup that contains no further details. > > I filed a support ticket to ask about it, and they said that it was their security/fraud mechanism, and that they recommended disabling ad-blockers. By trial and error I found that the domain which had to be unblocked was metrics.plaid.com for login to work. > > Based on the uBlock Origin console, it seems that a request must be made to "https://metrics.plaid.com/init" in order for login to be accepted. I do not know the function of other things that the metrics.plaid.com might be used for. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/k03lby0mfg0o8ckocg00occswgkggk8fanb4wva4p4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/162of2s0f19cgc8kskkwogoccwc04kssb91xduh53k.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
